書名: 臺灣閩南語囡仔歌輯錄

段: 月光光，秀才郎，騎白馬，過南塘。南塘好光景，揭竹篙，挽龍眼，龍眼粒粒墜，挽了走過位，起步走，走店仔口，挈錢買炒豆，炒豆燒滾滾，食米粉，米粉炒紅蝦，紅蝦真大尾，囡仔食發粿，發粿真正甜，阿嫂也生後生，後生真心適，大埕曝粟，粟發芽，囡仔塗骹爬，爬去，阮兜做戲，戲好看，囡仔睏晏晏，精神食麵線，麵線真好食，走相掠，掠無人，一蕊花紅紅，囡仔叫大人，大人去拋網，拋著魚，魚賣錢，錢買餅，囡仔來食餅，食了真歡喜，囡仔坐交椅，椅低低，囡仔叫老爸，老爸來抱起，門口買栗子，栗子真正芳，買紅柑，紅柑皮椪椪，正月穿媠衫，豬肉好食焄規坩。

Goeh8 kng-kng, siu3-chai5-long5, khia5 peh8-be2, koe3 lam5-tng5. lam5-tng5 ho2 kong-keng2, gia5 tek-ko, ban2 geng5-geng2, geng5-geng2 liap8 liap8 tui7, ban2 liau2 chau2 koe3 ui7, khi2-pou7 chau2, chau2 kau3 tiam3-a2-khau2, theh8 chinn5 be2 chha2 tau7, chha2 tau7 sio-kun2-kun2, chiah8 bi2-hun2, bi2-hun2 chha2 ang5-he5, ang5-he5 chin toa7-boe2, gin2-a2 chiah8 hoat-koe2, hoat-koe2 chin-chiann3 tinn, a-so2--a2 senn hau7-senn, hau7-senn chin sim-sek, toa7-tiann5 teh phak8-chhek, chhek hoat-ge5, gin2-a2 thou5-kha pe5, pe5 be7 khi3, goan2 tau teh cho3-hi3, hi3 ho2-khoann3, gin2-a2 khun3 oann3-oann3, cheng-sin5 chiah8 mi7-soann3, mi7-soann3 chin ho2-chiah8, chau2 sio-liah8, liah8 bo5 lang5, chit8 lui2 hoe ang5-ang5, gin2-a2 kio3 toa7-lang5, toa7-lang5 khi3 pha-bang7, pha tioh8 hi5, hi5 be7 chinn5, chinn5 be2 piann2, gin2-a2 lai5 chiah8 piann2, chiah8 liau2 chin hoann-hi2, gin2-a2 che7 kau-i2, i2 ke7-ke7, gin2-a2 kio3 lau7-pe7, lau7-pe7 lai5 pho7 khi2, mng5-khau2 be2 lat8-chi2, lat8-chi2 chin-chiann3 phang, be2 ang5-kam, ang5-kam phoe5 phong3-phong3, chiann--goeh8 chheng7 sui2-sann, ti-bah ho2-chiah8 kun5 kui khann.
月光光，老公佇菜園，菜園掘鬆鬆，卜種蔥。蔥無芽，卜種茶，茶無花，卜種瓜，瓜無籽，掠老婆仔來扑死，扑死佇佗位？扑死佇弓蕉骹，用啥麼貯？用破豬槽，用啥麼勘？用破米籮，啥人跪？老海瑞，啥人拜？老囝婿，啥人揭香？老新娘。

Goeh8 kng-kng, lau7-kong ti7 chhai3-hng5, chhai3-hng5 kut8 sang-sang, beh cheng3 chhang. Chhang bo5 ge5, beh cheng3 te5, te5 bo5 hoe, beh cheng3 koe, koe bo5 chi2, liah8 lau7-po5--a2 lai5 phah-si2, phah-si2 ti7 toh-ui7? Phah-si2 ti7 kin-chio kha, eng7 siann2-mih te2? Eng7 phoa3-ti-cho5, eng7 siann2-mih kham3? Eng7 phoa3-bi2-loa5, siann2-lang5 kui7? Lau7 Hai2-sui7, siann2-lang5 pai3? Lau7 kiann2-sai3, siann2-lang5 giah8 hiunn? Lau7 sin-niu5.
月光光，油點倉，三歲囝，捀檳榔，捀阿公店，阿公阿媽釣魚，魚頭魚尾請親家，親家愛食鯽魚挖目睭，親姆愛食韭菜淋麻油，淋徦骹也毬，手也毬，揭大刀，剖石榴，石榴開，乞食幔棕蓑。

Goeh8 kng-kng, iu5 tiam2 chhng, sann hoe3 kiann2, phang5 pin-nng5, phang5 kau3 a-kong tiam3, a-kong a-ma2 tio3-hi5, hi5-thau5 hi5-boe2 chhiann2 chhin-ke, chhin-ke ai3 chiah8 chit-hi5 ou2 bak8-chiu, chhinn-m2 ai3 chiah8 ku2-chhai3 lam5 moa5-iu5, lam5 kah kha ia7 siunn5, chhiu2 ia7 siunn5, gia5 toa7-to, phoa3 chioh8-liu5, chioh8-liu5 khui, khit-chiah8 moa chang-sui.
月光光，秀才郎，走白馬，過南塘；南塘水深得過，掠貓來算貨，算著，揭竹篙挵鶆鷂；鶆鷂重，擔箸籠，箸籠輕，擔菅蓁；菅蓁浮浮觸著牛，牛咩咩吼，觸著狗，狗訇訇吠，吠恁田老爹，轉來食飯；飯未煮，卜食米，米未挨，卜食雞，雞未刣，卜食鳳梨，鳳梨未拎，卜食阿婆尻川爿；阿婆上壁，兩粒奶赤赤赤。

Goeh8 kng-kng, siu3-chai5-long5, chau2 peh8-be2, koe3 lam5-tng5; lam5-tng5 chui2 chhim be7 tit koe3, liah8 niau lai5 sng3-hoe3, sng3 be7 tioh8, gia5 tek-ko long3 lai7-hio7; lai7-hio7 tang7, tann ti-lang, ti-lang khin, tann koann-chin; koann-chin phu5-phu5 tak tioh8 gu5, gu5 me3-me3 hau2, tak tioh8 kau2, kau2 ngiauh-ngiauh pui7, pui7 lin2 chhan5 lau7-tia, tng2 lai5 chiah8-png7; png7 boe7 chu2, beh chiah8 bi2, bi2 boe7 e, beh chiah8 ke, ke boe7 thai5, beh chiah8 ong5-lai5, ong5-lai5 boe7 leng5, beh chiah8 a-po5 kha-chhng-peng5; a-po5 peh chiunn7 piah, nng7 liap8 leng chhiah-chhiah-chhiah.
月娘月光光，騎馬過南塘。南塘得過，掠貓仔來戴髻；戴著，揭竹篙，托鶆鶚；鶆鶚喙開開，笠仔換棕蓑，棕蓑好遮雨，刣豬羊，反豬肚，豬肚反輾轉，火箠換火管，火管好歕風，老婆扑老公，老公癲去死，老婆偷糶米，糶幾升？糶兩升，一升予查某囝硩手巾，硩無夠，沿路行，沿路哭，哭卜死，哭卜食豬屎疕。

Goeh8-niu5 goeh8 kng-kng, khia5-be2 koe3 lam5-tng5. Lam5-tng5 be7 tit koe3, liah8 niau-a2 lai5 ti3 ke3; ti3 be7 tioh8, gia5 tek-ko, thuh lai7-hio7; lai7-hio7 chhui3 khui-khui, leh8-a2 oann7 chang-sui, chang-sui ho2 jia-hou7, thai5 ti iunn5, peng2 ti-tou7, ti-tou7 peng2 lin3-tng2, hoe2-chhoe5 oann7 hoe2-kong2, hoe2-kong2 ho2 pun5-hong, lau7-po5 phah lau7-kong, lau7-kong tian khi3 si2, lau7-po5 thau thio3-bi2, thio3 kui2 seng? Thio3 nng7 seng, chit8 seng hou7 cha-bou2-kiann2 teh chhiu2-kun, teh bo5-kau3, ian5-lou7 kiann5, ian5-lou7 khau3, khau3 beh si2, khau3 beh chiah8 ti-sai2-phi2.
月娘月光光，騎馬過南塘。南塘得過，掠貓仔來戴髻；戴著，揭竹篙，托鶆鶚；鶆鷂跋落田，嫁酒瓶，酒瓶卜貯酒，嫁掃帚，掃帚卜掃地，嫁予賣雜細，賣雜細兮卜搖鈴鐺，嫁司功，司功卜讀疏，嫁破布，破布卜補衫，嫁牛擔，牛擔卜犁田，嫁酒瓶，酒瓶走入空，目[目+聶]仔無頭鬃。

Goeh8-niu5 goeh8 kng-kng, khia5-be2 koe3 lam5-tng5. lam5-tng5 be7 tit koe3, liah8 niau-a2 lai5 ti3 ke3; ti3 be7 tioh8, gia5 tek-ko, thuh lai7-hio7; lai7-hio7 poah8 loh8 chhan5, ke3 chiu2-pan5, chiu2-pan5 beh te2 chiu2, ke3 sau3-chhiu2, sau3-chhiu2 beh sau3-te7, ke3 hou7 be7 chap8-se3, be7 chap8-se3--e5 beh io5 leng5-liang, ke3 sai-kong, sai-kong beh thak8 se, ke3 phoa3-pou3, phoa3-pou3 beh pou2-sann, ke3 gu5-tann, gu5-tann beh le5-chhan5, ke3 chiu2-pan5, chiu2-pan5 chau2 jip8 khang, bak8-nih-a2 bo5 thau5-chang.
月娘月光光，起厝田中央；田螺做水缸，秞草做眠床，目屎做飯湯。
Goeh8-niu5 goeh8 kng-kng, khi2 chhu3 chhan5-tiong-ng; chhan5-le5 cho3 chui2-kng, tiu7-chhau2 cho3 bin5-chhng5, bak8-sai2 cho3 png7-thng.
月娘月光光，起厝田中央，田螺做水缸，色褲做眠床，骹帛做大腸。
Goeh8-niu5 goeh8 kng-kng, khi2 chhu3 chhan5-tiong-ng, chhan5-le5 cho3 chui2-kng, sek-khou3 cho3 bin5-chhng5, kha-peh8 cho3 toa7-tng5.
月娘娘，月弟弟，汝是兄，我是弟，呣通割我囡仔雙爿耳。
Goeh8-niu5-niu5, goeh8-ti-ti, li2 si7 hiann, goa2 si7 ti7, m7-thang koah goa2 gin2-a2 siang-peng5 hinn7.
水蛙仔囝，出世肚大大，喙闊闊，田中央，起厝蹛，水蛙仔囝，無人教，自然會唱歌。
Chui2-ke-a2-kiann2, chhut-si3 tou7 toa7-toa7, chhui3 khoah-khoah, chhan5-tiong-ng, khi2 chhu3 toa3, chui2-ke-a2-kiann2, bo5 lang5 ka3, chu7-jian5 e7 chhiunn3-koa.
水蛙仔倌，牽金線，牽馬落南山，南山無馬草，牽老婆仔門骹口，老婆仔扑一下，疼疼疼，投來投去投寶鏡，寶鏡去瓦窯，投來投去投嬸婆，嬸婆開窗仔賣粗紙，投來投去投著我，害我心肝噗噗彈，雞母弄雞僆，雞僆跋落井，井烏烏，鱔魚咬魚姑，魚姑沒沒泅，老公老媽穿破裘，穿十八補，佇船仔頭哭無某，掠一个水蛙仔倌予做某。

Chui2-ke-a2-koann, khan kim-soann3, khan-be2 loh8 lam5-soann, lam5-soann bo5 be2-chhau2, khan kau3 lau7-po5--a2 mng5-kha-khau2, lau7-po5--a2 phah chit8-e7, thiann3-thiann3-thiann3, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 po2-kiann3, po2-kiann3 khi3 hia7-io5, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 chim2-po5, chim2-po5 khui thang-a2 be7 chhou-choa2, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 tioh8 goa2, hai7 goa2 sim-koann phok8-phok8-toann5, ke-bu2 lang7 ke-noa7, ke-noa7 poah8 loh8 chenn2, chenn2 ou-ou, sian7-hi5 ka7 hi5-kou, hi5-kou bok8-bok8-siu5, lau7-kong lau7-ma2 chheng7 phoa3-hiu5, chheng7 kau3 chap8-peh pou2, ti7 chun5-a2-thau5 khau3 bo5 bou2, liah8 chit8 e5 chui2-ke-a2-koann hou7 cho3 bou2.
水蛙仔倌，牽金線，牽馬上南山，南山無馬草，牽老婆仔門骹口，老婆扑一下，疼疼疼，投來投去投保正，保正去貺龜，投姊夫，姊夫去賣蠔，投嬸婆，嬸婆賣粗紙，投來投去投著我，害我心肝噗噗彈，雞母弄雞僆，雞僆下落井，井烏烏，鱔魚咬蝦姑，蝦姑走去踮，龜咬劍，劍一缺，龜咬鱉，鱉無尾，蟺蟲咬柿粿，柿粿必做周，蟺蟲咬鰗鰍，鰗鰍水裡泅，老人穿破裘，破裘十八補，佇田岸頭哭無某，掠著水蛙仔倌予做某。

Chui2-ke-a2-koann, khan kim-soann3, khan be2 chiunn7 lam5-soann, lam5-soann bo5 be2-chhau2, khan kau3 lau7-po5--a2 mng5-kha-khau2, lau7-po5 phah chit8-e7, thiann3-thiann3-thiann3, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 po2-chiann3, po2-chiann3 khi3 tuh-ku, tau5 chi2-hu, chi2-hu khi3 be7 o5, tau5 chim2-po5, chim2-po5 be7 chhou-choa2, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 tioh8 goa2, hai7 goa2 sim-koann phok8-phok8-toann5, ke-bu2 lang7 ke-noa7, ke-noa7 he7 loh8 chenn2, chenn2 ou-ou, sian7-hi5 ka7 he5-kou, he5-kou chau2 khi3 ku, ku ka7 kiam3, kiam3 chit8 khih, ku ka7 pih, pih bo5 boe2, sian7-thang5 ka7 khi7-koe2, khi7-koe2 pit cho3 chiu, sian7-thang5 ka7 hou5-chhiu, hou5-chhiu chui2--nih siu5, lau7-lang5 chheng7 phoa3-hiu5, phoa3-hiu5 chap8-peh pou2, ti7 chhan5-hoann7-thau5 khau3 bo5 bou2, liah8 tioh8 chui2-ke-a2-koann hou7 cho3 bou2.
水蛙仔倌，牽金線，牽馬落南山，南山無馬草，牽老婆仔門骹口，老婆仔跋一倒，疼疼疼，投保正，保正賣真珠，投來投去投姊夫，姊夫賣粗紙，投來投去投著我，害我心肝噗噗彈，雞母[毛^火]雞僆，雞僆跋落井，井烏烏，卜刣刣尼姑，尼姑走去踮，龜咬劍，劍無尾，蟺蟲咬柿粿，柿粿必做周，蟺蟲咬鰗鰍，鰗鰍水裡泅，老人穿破裘，穿去十八補，佇田岸頭哭無某，哭著水蛙仔囝予做某。

Chui2-ke-a2-koann, khan kim-soann3 , khan be2 loh8 lam5-soann, lam5-soann bo5 be2-chhau2, khan kau3 lau7-po5--a2 mng5-kha-khau2, lau7-po5--a2 poah8 chit8 to2, thiann3-thiann3-thiann3, tau5 po2-chiann3, po2-chiann3 be7 chin-chu, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 chi2-hu, chi2-hu be7 chhou-choa2, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 tioh8 goa2, hai7 goa2 sim-koann phok8-phok8-toann5, ke-bu2 chhoa7 ke-noa7, ke-noa7 poah8 loh8 chenn2, chenn2 ou-ou, beh thai5 thai5 ni5-kou, ni5-kou chau2 khi3 ku, ku ka7 kiam3, kiam3 bo5 boe2, sian7-thang5 ka7 khi7-koe2, khi7-koe2 pit cho3 chiu, sian7-thang5 ka7 hou5-chhiu, hou5-chhiu chui2--nih siu5, lau7-lang5 chheng7 phoa3-hiu5, chheng7 khi3 chap8-peh pou2, ti7 chhan5-hoann7-thau5 khau3 bo5 bou2, khau3 tioh8 chui2-ke-a2-kiann2 hou7 cho3 bou2.

水蛙仔倌，牽金線，牽馬落南山，南山無馬草，走老婆仔門骹口，老婆仔扑一下，疼疼疼，投來投去投目鏡，目鏡去做客，投來投去投阿伯，阿伯去貺龜，投來投去投姊夫，姊夫去刻紙，投來投去投著我，害我心肝噗噗彈，雞母弄雞僆，雞僆跳落井，井烏烏，鱔魚咬蝦姑，蝦姑走去踮，龜咬劍，劍無尾，龜咬粿，粿好食，鵁鴒換笳[竹^歷]，笳[竹^歷]好曝粟，四嬸換四叔，四叔好歕風，老婆仔扑老公，老婆偷糶米，糶幾升？糶升半，頭鬃仔螺扭起來看，看啥貨，看新娘，新娘看著大大大。有錢則來娶，娶入廳，拜阿兄，阿兄穿褲白溜溜，阿嫂穿褲結四毬，四毬接牡丹，牡丹接石榴，石榴開花朱朱紅，食爸食母呣成人，食兄兄受氣，食嫂嫂唸醹。謳咾兄，謳咾弟，謳咾親家敖教示，教示汝呰个頭無梳面無洗，路溝仔糜糊糊一喙[卑+頁]。

Chui2-ke-a2-koann, khan kim-soann3, khan be2 loh8 lam5-soann, lam5-soann bo5 be2-chhau2, chau2 kau3 lau7-po5--a2 mng5-kha-khau2, lau7-po5--a2 phah chit8-e7, thiann3-thiann3-thiann3, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 bak8-kiann3, bak8-kiann3 khi3 cho3-kheh, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 a-peh, a-peh khi3 tuh-ku, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 chi2-hu, chi2-hu khi3 khek-choa2, tau5 lai5 tau5 khi3 tau5 tioh8 goa2, hai7 goa2 sim-koann phok8-phok8-toann5, ke-bu2 lang7 ke-noa7, ke-noa7 thiau3 loh8 chenn2, chenn2 ou-ou, sian7-hi5 ka7 he5-kou, he5-kou chau2 khi3 ku, ku ka7 kiam3, kiam3 bo5 boe2, ku ka7 koe2, koe2 ho2-chiah8, ka-leng7 oann7 kio5-lek8, kio5-lek8 ho2 phak8 chhek, si3-chim2 oann7 si3-chek, si3-chek ho2 pun5-hong, lau7-po5--a2 phah lau7-kong, lau7-po5 thau thio3 bi2, thio3 kui2 seng? Thio3 seng poann3, thau5-chang-a2-le5 giu2 khi2 lai5 khoann3, khoann3 siann2-hoe3, khoann3 sin-niu5, sin-niu5 khoann3 tioh8 toa7-toa7-toa7. u7-chinn5 chiah lai5 chhoa7, chhoa7 jip8 thiann, pai3 a-hiann, a-hiann chheng7-khou3 peh8-liu-liu, a-so2 chheng7-khou3 kat si3-kiu5, si3-kiu5 chiap bou2-tan, bou2-tan chiap chioh8-liu5, chioh8-liu5 khui-hoe chu-chu ang5, chiah8 pe7 chiah8 bu2 m7-chiann5 lang5, chiah8 hiann hiann siu7-khi3, chiah8 so2 so2 liam7-ju2. o-lo2 hiann, o-lo2 ti7, o-lo2 chhin-ke gau5 ka3-si7, ka3-si7 li2 chiah-e5 thau5 bo5 se bin7 bo5 se2, lou7-kau-a2-moe5 kou5 kou5 chit8 chhui3-phoe2.
水狩爺！骹翹翹，面憔憔，保庇大豬來入椆。來悾悾，去戇戇，腰肚據我摸。恁某吵，呣免聽；恁母罵，呣免驚；我若叫，汝著乖乖也行。
